title: Dark Analog Free Watch Face
summary: Enjoy this watch face on your Android Wear.  Customizable in 8 colors!
developerAddress:
C/ Travessera de Gràcia, nº 60, 2-1
08006 Barcelona
Barcelona
description: Inspired by Material Design of Google, this watchface will look great on your wearable (LG Watch Urbane, LG G Watch R, Motorola Moto 360, Sony Smartwatch 3, Asus ZenWatch, Samsung Gear Live, …). Free Dark Analog is prepared to fit on any screen (round or square) and any pixel density. It includes a companion app for your smartphone (accessible from the Android Wear official application). Use it to configure your watch face. Choose from 8 selected colors! FEATURES  • Free.  • No ads.  • Choose from 8 colors to customize the detail.  • In ambient mode you will continue displaying the time information and notifications.All our watch faces are made with the latest development tools (API of Google and Android Wear). If you like Dark Analog Free, you will enjoy even more with Dark Analog: Incorporates the date on the screen, change the style and much more... Also on Google Play. DEVICE SPECS  • Smartphone: Android 4.3 (Jelly Bean) or higher.  • Wearable: Android 5.0 (Lollipop) or higher. IMPORTANTAfter installation, expected to Android Wear application has loaded the new watch face. This process may take a few moments. For any questions or suggestions please contact us at the following email address: i3weardevelopers@gmail.com Your opinion is very important. If you have been satisfied with our design, we would appreciate a positive assessment of our application.
descriptionHTML:
Inspired by Material Design of Google, this watchface will look great on your wearable (LG Watch Urbane, LG G Watch R, Motorola Moto 360, Sony Smartwatch 3, Asus ZenWatch, Samsung Gear Live, …).


Free Dark Analog is prepared to fit on any screen (round or square) and any pixel density.


It includes a companion app for your smartphone (accessible from the Android Wear official application). Use it to configure your watch face. Choose from 8 selected colors!


FEATURES
• Free.
• No ads.
• Choose from 8 colors to customize the detail.
• In ambient mode you will continue displaying the time information and notifications.


All our watch faces are made with the latest development tools (API of Google and Android Wear).


If you like Dark Analog Free, you will enjoy even more with Dark Analog: Incorporates the date on the screen, change the style and much more... Also on Google Play.


DEVICE SPECS
• Smartphone: Android 4.3 (Jelly Bean) or higher.
• Wearable: Android 5.0 (Lollipop) or higher.


IMPORTANT
After installation, expected to Android Wear application has loaded the new watch face. This process may take a few moments.


For any questions or suggestions please contact us at the following email address: i3weardevelopers@gmail.com


Your opinion is very important. If you have been satisfied with our design, we would appreciate a positive assessment of our application.
comments: How do you apply this Can't find it anywhere not in widgets , wallpapers ,  apps or themes

Yes! Finally a high contrast analogue watch face. This is exactly the simplicity and functionality I wanted. Thank you developers! Keep going! -  see Hamilton mil spec watches of Vietnam war era for ideas along this line.
